data.eml:eml: Transisthmian differentiation in the tree-climbing mangrove crab Aratus H. Milne Edwards, 1853 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Sesarmidae), with description of a new species from the tropical eastern Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thiercelin, N., Schubart, C. D. (2014): Transisthmian differentiation in the tree-climbing mangrove crab Aratus H. Milne Edwards, 1853 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Sesarmidae), with description of a new species from the tropical eastern Pacific. Zootaxa 3793 (5): 545-560, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3793.5.3
